Luthetus.TextEditor.RazorLib.Autocompletes.Models.WordAutocompleteService Class Reference Luthetus.TextEditor.RazorLib.Autocompletes.Models.WordAutocompleteService Inheritance diagram for Luthetus.TextEditor.RazorLib.Autocompletes.Models.WordAutocompleteService:
Collaboration diagram for Luthetus.TextEditor.RazorLib.Autocompletes.Models.WordAutocompleteService:
Public Member Functions
WordAutocompleteService (WordAutocompleteIndexer wordAutocompleteIndexer)
List< string > GetAutocompleteOptions (string word)
GetAutocompleteOptions passes in as a parameter the contiguous letters or digits that are to the left of the cursor. If the cursor is in the middle of a word, only the letters or digits to the left of the cursor are provided. If the text immediately to the left of the cursor is not a letter or digit, then string.Empty is returned. If the cursor is at the start of the document (rowIndex 0 and columnIndex 0), then string.Empty is returned.

GetAutocompleteOptions passes in as a parameter the contiguous letters or digits that are to the left of the cursor. If the cursor is in the middle of a word, only the letters or digits to the left of the cursor are provided. If the text immediately to the left of the cursor is not a letter or digit, then string.Empty is returned. If the cursor is at the start of the document (rowIndex 0 and columnIndex 0), then string.Empty is returned.
